product_name: AlpineAire Black Bart Chili With Beans - 2 Servings
long_description: Instant entree of beef and beans in a zesty tomato sauce. Can be prepared right in its foil pouch: just add boiling water, let stand for a few minutes and then serve. For higher altitudes, prepare chili in a pot and let it simmer for 3-4 minutes longer. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents.
short_description: Instant entree of beef and beans in a zesty tomato sauce.
